FuncDef: The display dragonfly pfc adjust statistics command displays statistics on dragonfly deadlock prevention. The display dragonfly pfc adjust statistics command displays statistics on dragonfly deadlock prevention. This command is supported only on the CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
